data.text:
COMMUNITY. CONVERSATION. CONNECTION.

The Basilica Conversation Series explores the power of arts and culture at the intersection of climate and social advocacy through community panels and intimate interviews. Here, you will find upcoming information on all aspects of the series.

The Basilica Conversation Series Podcast, hosted by Basilica Hudson Co-Founder and Director Melissa Auf der Maur, highlights people and organizations that reflect and inspire our mission to be a platform for independent and innovative voices, and to support artists, filmmakers, musicians and climate change advocates.

“What inspired me to start this conversation series is the desire to listen and learn.” – Melissa Auf der Maur
